command.name: fix
command.description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code

disambiguation.description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code
examples: There is a problem in this code. Rewrite the code to show it with the bug fixed.

parts.text:
Type '{ subtotal: number; shippingTotal: number; total: number; status: $Enums.OrderStatus; id: string; orderNo: string; customerName: string; customerPhone: string; shippingAddress: string; ... 9 more ...; statusUpdatedBy: { ...; } | null; }' is not assignable to type 'OrderReceiptData'.
  Types of property 'items' are incompatible.
    Type '{ id: string; product: { packageDuration: string | null; images: { url: string; }[]; }; total: Decimal; title: string; qty: number; unitPrice: Decimal; }[]' is not assignable to type '{ id: string; title: string; qty: number; unitPrice: string | number; total: string | number; product?: { packageDuration?: string | null | undefined; images?: { url: string; }[] | undefined; } | null | undefined; }[]'.
      Type '{ id: string; product: { packageDuration: string | null; images: { url: string; }[]; }; total: Decimal; title: string; qty: number; unitPrice: Decimal; }' is not assignable to type '{ id: string; title: string; qty: number; unitPrice: string | number; total: string | number; product?: { packageDuration?: string | null | undefined; images?: { url: string; }[] | undefined; } | null | undefined; }'.
        Types of property 'unitPrice' are incompatible.
          Type 'Decimal' is not assignable to type 'string | number'.

message.text:
/fix Type '{ subtotal: number; shippingTotal: number; total: number; status: $Enums.OrderStatus; id: string; orderNo: string; customerName: string; customerPhone: string; shippingAddress: string; ... 9 more ...; statusUpdatedBy: { ...; } | null; }' is not assignable to type 'OrderReceiptData'.
  Types of property 'items' are incompatible.
    Type '{ id: string; product: { packageDuration: string | null; images: { url: string; }[]; }; total: Decimal; title: string; qty: number; unitPrice: Decimal; }[]' is not assignable to type '{ id: string; title: string; qty: number; unitPrice: string | number; total: string | number; product?: { packageDuration?: string | null | undefined; images?: { url: string; }[] | undefined; } | null | undefined; }[]'.
      Type '{ id: string; product: { packageDuration: string | null; images: { url: string; }[]; }; total: Decimal; title: string; qty: number; unitPrice: Decimal; }' is not assignable to type '{ id: string; title: string; qty: number; unitPrice: string | number; total: string | number; product?: { packageDuration?: string | null | undefined; images?: { url: string; }[] | undefined; } | null | undefined; }'.
        Types of property 'unitPrice' are incompatible.
          Type 'Decimal' is not assignable to type 'string | number'.

response.value: are converted to numbers before passing to

examples: Add a function that returns the sum of two numbers

disambiguation.description: Generate unit tests for the selected code. The user does not want to fix their existing tests.
examples: Write a set of detailed unit test functions for the code above.
